panels.description: Display of actual temperature in Padua.

defaults.noValue: No data in the specified interval

targets.rawSql: SELECT gather_time as time, readings as Temperature, sensor_name FROM "sc_database"."temperature" WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime AND sensor_name IN (${temperature_sensor:singlequote})) ORDER BY time ASC

panels.title: Water Level in Padua, Italy

panels.description: Display of average temperature in Padua.

defaults.noValue: No data in the specified interval

targets.rawSql:
SELECT AVG(t1.readings)
FROM 
(SELECT readings from temperature
WHERE (gather_time >= $__fromTime AND gather_time <= $__toTime)
AND gather_time in (select max(gather_time) from temperature group by sensor_name)) t1

panels.title: Average Temperature in Padua, Italy

WHERE (gather_time >= $__fromTime AND gather_time <= $__toTime)

panels.title: Displays the average concentration of NO2 particles suspended in air in Padua.

panels.description: Display of statistics about apparent temperature in Padua.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT h1.sensor_name as Sensor, AVG(h1.heat_index) as "Average", MAX(h1.heat_index) as "Max", MIN(h1.heat_index) as "Min"
FROM
(SELECT t.sensor_name, t.readings as temp, h.readings as hum, t.gather_time as time,
(-8.78469475556)+((1.61139411)*temp)+((2.338548839)*hum)+((-0.146116050)*temp*hum)+((-0.012308094)*(POWER(temp,2)))+((-0.0164248277778)*(POWER(hum,2)))+((0.002211732)*(POWER(temp,2))*hum)+((0.00072546)*temp*(POWER(hum,2)))+((-0.000003582)*(POWER(temp,2))*(POWER(hum,2))) as heat_index
FROM sc_database.temperature t
JOIN sc_database.humidity h
ON h.sensor_name = t.sensor_name AND h.gather_time = t.gather_time) h1
WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime )
GROUP by h1.sensor_name

panels.title: Heat Index Statistics in Padua, Italy

panels.description: Display of statistics about actual temperature in Padua.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT t6.sensor_name as Sensor, a as Average, mean as Mean, m as "Min", mx as "Max"
FROM
(SELECT t4.sensor_name, AVG(t4.readings) as mean
FROM 
(SELECT t2.sensor_name, t3.readings, t3.c
FROM
(SELECT t1.sensor_name, MAX(t1.c) as c from 
(SELECT t.sensor_name, t.readings, COUNT(t.sensor_name) as c from (select sensor_name, readings, gather_time as time from temperature WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) ORDER BY time desc) t group by t.sensor_name, t.readings) t1
group by sensor_name ) t2
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT t.sensor_name, t.readings, COUNT(t.sensor_name) as c from (select sensor_name, readings, gather_time as time from temperature WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) ORDER BY time desc) t group by t.sensor_name, t.readings) t3
ON t2.sensor_name = t3.sensor_name AND t3.c = t2.c ) t4
group by t4.sensor_name) t5
LEFT JOIN
(SELECT t.sensor_name, AVG(t.readings) as a, MIN(readings) as m, MAX(readings) as mx FROM (select sensor_name, readings, gather_time as time from temperature WHERE ( time >= $__fromTime AND time <= $__toTime ) ORDER BY time desc) t group by t.sensor_name) t6
ON t5.sensor_name = t6.sensor_name

panels.title: Temperature Statistics in Padua, Italy
